data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Extensible event payload for domain-specific details". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

resultPayload.note: Marketplace/cross-biz isolation enforced for non-member adversary.

data.instruction: Attempt unauthorized cross-biz visibility/mutation in marketplace/enterprise scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Unauthorized access is denied and no sensitive tenant data leaks across business boundaries.

resultPayload.note: Marketplace/cross-biz isolation enforced for non-member adversary.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Attempt unauthorized cross-biz visibility/mutation in marketplace/enterprise scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Unauthorized access is denied and no sensitive tenant data leaks across business boundaries.
